# Spelling Checker using Tkinter and Python

This is GUI Speling Checker using Tkinter and Python. It was made whilst participating in the [Code First Girls](https://codefirstgirls.com/) Python MOOC which was a four week free course that I completed.

## Tech used

It was created using Python and Tkinter.
